mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Terl, Daniel Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left hand. Location Wounded: Snickers Ford. Date Wounded: 1864/07/19. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Returned to duty.
